3
The cows made a huge mess!
I am doing AV things.
Could you find a broom so I can get to the Math office?
Mrs. Kim

5
Hey, you!
Your synthesis essay was due last week.
You may not pass until you hand me your essay.
Excellent. What a sophisticated piece of writing.
Off you go!
Mr. Huang
